# calculate padj
```{r padj}
ms$padj <- p.adjust(ms$`P-value`, method = "fdr")

head(ms)

nrow(ms[ms$padj <= 0.05 & !is.na(ms$padj),])
ms[order(ms$padj),]
```

# divide column with names
```{r cols}
ms$gene_symbol <- sub(".*GN=", "", ms$Description)
ms$gene_symbol <- sub(" PE=.*", "", ms$gene_symbol)

head(ms)
```
